header.description: No header scalars — this report has no static header tokens.

rows.description: Each row represents one schema field definition with its key, type, unit, scale, and description.

totals.description: No totals — this report is a simple field listing.

semantics: No parameters or filters are required. The report displays all schema fields from the `app_schema_fields` table in a flat list.
transformations: No reshaping or computed columns. All tokens map 1:1 to source columns.
